    • Electronic

    Value added services for the electronics industry

    KISCO supports the electronics industry from the material aspect. In the electronics related market which develops in various processes, our motto is to provide materials to our customers in an accurate and rapid manner using our expertise in various fields as well as our mastery (‘know-how’) of material properties.
    The electronics industry continues to drive an increasing need for innovation, miniaturization, and cost competitiveness. KISCO Electronics connects chemistry by providing the most effective industry channel for our customers and suppliers.

    Generating value through broad expertise

    We offer our customers a diverse portfolio of products and services and develop successful collaborations by creating value through our innovative and cost-effective solutions to support the growth of the following major markets:


  • Semiconductor frontend and backend manufacturing
  • Solar and photovoltaic manufacturing
  • Light Emitting Diode (LED) manufacturing
  • Liquid Crystal Display (LCD) manufacturing
  • Flat Panel Display (FPD) manufacturing
  • UltraPure chemicals
  • Specialty chemicals
  • Recycling solutions
  • Equipment
  • Materials
  • Mixing and blending
  • Regional procurement hub

    • Our experienced team serves to meet each customers’ individual needs by delivering highly customized solutions. Besides offering a wide range of products and services, our core capabilities are in providing reliable and cost-effective logistics, optimizing supply chains, bulk as well as small items deliveries. We also assume responsibilities for regional procurement hub as well as Vendor Managed Inventory.

    RFID
